<script data-cfasync="false" type="text/javascript">
				var mi_version = '7.16.2';
				var mi_track_user = true;
				var mi_no_track_reason = '';
				
								var disableStr = 'ga-disable-UA-82857279-1';

				/* Function to detect opted out users */
				function __gtagTrackerIsOptedOut() {
					return document.cookie.indexOf( disableStr + '=true' ) > - 1;
				}

				/* Disable tracking if the opt-out cookie exists. */
				if ( __gtagTrackerIsOptedOut() ) {
					window[disableStr] = true;
				}

				/* Opt-out function */
				function __gtagTrackerOptout() {
					document.cookie = disableStr + '=true; expires=Thu, 31 Dec 2099 23:59:59 UTC; path=/';
					window[disableStr] = true;
				}

				if ( 'undefined' === typeof gaOptout ) {
					function gaOptout() {
						__gtagTrackerOptout();
					}
				}
								window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
				if ( mi_track_user ) {
					function __gtagTracker() {dataLayer.push( arguments );}
					__gtagTracker( 'js', new Date() );
					__gtagTracker( 'set', {
						'developer_id.dZGIzZG' : true,
						                    });
					__gtagTracker( 'config', 'UA-82857279-1', {
						forceSSL:true,					} );
										window.gtag = __gtagTracker;										(
						function () {
							/* https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/collection/analyticsjs/ */
							/* ga and __gaTracker compatibility shim. */
							var noopfn = function () {
								return null;
							};
							var newtracker = function () {
								return new Tracker();
							};
							var Tracker = function () {
								return null;
							};
							var p = Tracker.prototype;
							p.get = noopfn;
							p.set = noopfn;
							p.send = function (){
								var args = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments);
								args.unshift( 'send' );
								__gaTracker.apply(null, args);
							};
							var __gaTracker = function () {
								var len = arguments.length;
								if ( len === 0 ) {
									return;
								}
								var f = arguments[len - 1];
								if ( typeof f !== 'object' || f === null || typeof f.hitCallback !== 'function' ) {
									if ( 'send' === arguments[0] ) {
										var hitConverted, hitObject = false, action;
										if ( 'event' === arguments[1] ) {
											if ( 'undefined' !== typeof arguments[3] ) {
												hitObject = {
													'eventAction': arguments[3],
													'eventCategory': arguments[2],
													'eventLabel': arguments[4],
													'value': arguments[5] ? arguments[5] : 1,
												}
											}
										}
										if ( typeof arguments[2] === 'object' ) {
											hitObject = arguments[2];
										}
										if ( 'undefined' !== typeof (
											arguments[1].hitType
										) ) {
											hitObject = arguments[1];
										}
										if ( hitObject ) {
											action = 'timing' === arguments[1].hitType ? 'timing_complete' : hitObject.eventAction;
											hitConverted = mapArgs( hitObject );
											__gtagTracker( 'event', action, hitConverted );
										}
									}
									return;
								}

								function mapArgs( args ) {
									var gaKey, hit = {};
									var gaMap = {
										'eventCategory': 'event_category',
										'eventAction': 'event_action',
										'eventLabel': 'event_label',
										'eventValue': 'event_value',
										'nonInteraction': 'non_interaction',
										'timingCategory': 'event_category',
										'timingVar': 'name',
										'timingValue': 'value',
										'timingLabel': 'event_label',
									};
									for ( gaKey in gaMap ) {
										if ( 'undefined' !== typeof args[gaKey] ) {
											hit[gaMap[gaKey]] = args[gaKey];
										}
									}
									return hit;
								}

								try {
									f.hitCallback();
								} catch ( ex ) {
								}
							};
							__gaTracker.create = newtracker;
							__gaTracker.getByName = newtracker;
							__gaTracker.getAll = function () {
								return [];
							};
							__gaTracker.remove = noopfn;
							__gaTracker.loaded = true;
							window['__gaTracker'] = __gaTracker;
						}
					)();
									} else {
										console.log( "" );
					( function () {
							function __gtagTracker() {
								return null;
							}
							window['__gtagTracker'] = __gtagTracker;
							window['gtag'] = __gtagTracker;
					} )();
									}
			</script>

		};
		</script>

<meta content="President Biden is making the Republicans irrelevant" itemid="https://www.palmerreport.com/community/president-biden-is-making-the-republicans-irrelevant/37716/" itemprop="mainEntityOfPage" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/WebPage"><meta content="2021-03-26" itemprop="datePublished"><meta content="2021-03-25" itemprop="dateModified"><div itemprop="publisher" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Organization"><meta content="Palmer Report" itemprop="name"/><div itemprop="logo" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/ImageObject"><meta content="https://www.palmerreport.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/palmerreportLogo.jpg" itemprop="url"/></div></div><div itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person"><meta content="https://www.palmerreport.com/author/suzanne-shatto/" itemprop="url"><meta content="Suzanne Shatto" itemprop="name"/></meta></div><div itemprop="image" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/ImageObject"><meta content="https://www.palmerreport.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/joe-biden.jpg" itemprop="url"><meta content="1024" itemprop="width"><meta content="616" itemprop="height"/></meta></meta></div><div itemprop="interactionStatistic" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/InteractionCounter"><meta content="http://schema.org/CommentAction" itemprop="interactionType"/><meta content="0" itemprop="userInteractionCount"/></div> <div class="fl-post-grid-image">

<div class="fl-post-grid-post fl-post-grid-image-above-title fl-post-columns-post fl-post-align-center post-37737 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-analysis category-politics tag-politics" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/BlogPosting">
<meta content="A tale of two press conferences" itemid="https://www.palmerreport.com/analysis/a-tale-of-two-press-conferences/37737/" itemprop="mainEntityOfPage" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/WebPage"/><meta content="2021-03-26" itemprop="datePublished"/><meta content="2021-03-26" itemprop="dateModified"/><div itemprop="publisher" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/Organization"><meta content="Palmer Report" itemprop="name"/><div itemprop="logo" itemscope="" itemtype="https://schema.org/ImageObject"><meta content="https://www.palmerreport.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/palmerreportLogo.jpg" itemprop="url"/></div></div><div itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person"><meta content="https://www.palmerreport.com/author/robert-harrington/" itemprop="url"><meta content="Robert Harrington" itemprop="name"/></meta></div><div itemprop="image" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/ImageObject"><meta content="https://www.palmerreport.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/joe-biden.jpg" itemprop="url"/><meta content="1024" itemprop="width"/><meta content="726" itemprop="height"/></div><div itemprop="interactionStatistic" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/InteractionCounter"><meta content="http://schema.org/CommentAction" itemprop="interactionType"/><meta content="0" itemprop="userInteractionCount"/></div> <div class="fl-post-grid-image">
<a href="https://www.palmerreport.com/analysis/a-tale-of-two-press-conferences/37737/" rel="bookmark" title="A tale of two press conferences">
<img alt="" class="attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image" height="213" loading="lazy" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px" src="https://www.palmerreport.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/joe-biden-300x213.jpg" srcset="https://s19137.pcdn.co/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/joe-biden-300x213.jpg 300w, https://s19137.pcdn.co/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/joe-biden-768x545.jpg 768w, https://s19137.pcdn.co/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/joe-biden.jpg 1024w" width="300"/> </a>
</div>
<div class="fl-post-grid-text">
<h2 class="fl-post-grid-title" itemprop="headline">
<a href="https://www.palmerreport.com/analysis/a-tale-of-two-press-conferences/37737/" title="A tale of two press conferences">A tale of two press conferences</a>
</h2>
<div class="fl-post-grid-meta">
<span class="fl-post-grid-author">
				By <a href="https://www.palmerreport.com/author/robert-harrington/"><span>Robert Harrington</span></a> </span>
<span class="fl-sep">|</span>
<span class="fl-post-grid-date">
					Mar 26, 2021				</span>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="fl-post-column add" style="padding-left: 0px; padding-right: 0px; width: 370px; display:block;">
<div class="add-wrap responsive" style="margin: 0; padding: 0; width:336px; height:280;">

</h2>
<div class="fl-post-grid-meta">

<div class="fl-post-grid-post fl-post-grid-image-above-title fl-post-columns-post fl-post-align-center post-37717 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-community" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/BlogPosting">

<div class="fl-post-grid-post fl-post-grid-image-above-title fl-post-columns-post fl-post-align-center post-37704 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-analysis category-politics tag-politics" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/BlogPosting">

<div class="fl-post-grid-text">
<h2 class="fl-post-grid-title" itemprop="headline">
<a href="https://www.palmerreport.com/analysis/lauren-boebert-caught-trying-to-pull-a-fast-one/37696/" title="Lauren Boebert caught trying to pull a fast one">Lauren Boebert caught trying to pull a fast one</a>
</h2>
<div class="fl-post-grid-meta">
<span class="fl-post-grid-author">
				By <a href="https://www.palmerreport.com/author/billpalmer/"><span>Bill Palmer</span></a> </span>
<span class="fl-sep">|</span>
<span class="fl-post-grid-date">
					Mar 24, 2021				</span>

<style id="yikes-inc-easy-mailchimp-public-styles-inline-css">
			.yikes-mailchimp-container-2 {
			color:#333333;padding-top:0em;padding-right:0em;padding-bottom:0em;padding-left:0em;width:100%;border-style:solid;border-color:#0a0a0a;border-width:3px;			}
							.yikes-mailchimp-container-2 .yikes-easy-mc-submit-button-2 {
				background-color: #f2cc37;
				background: #f2cc37; <!-- overwrite submit buttons that use gradients for backgrounds -->
				}
								.yikes-mailchimp-container-2 .yikes-easy-mc-submit-button.yikes-easy-mc-submit-button-2 .yikes-mailchimp-submit-button-span-text {
				font-size: 18px;
				}
								.yikes-mailchimp-container-2 .yikes-easy-mc-submit-button-2 {
				color: #0c0c0c;
				}
								.yikes-mailchimp-container-2 .yikes-easy-mc-submit-button-2 {
				width: 100%;
				}
								.yikes-mailchimp-container-2 input,
				.yikes-mailchimp-container-2 select {
				font-size: 12px;
				}
								.yikes-mailchimp-container-2 label span:first-child {
				display: none;
				}
				.yikes-mailchimp-container-2 label button span.yikes-mailchimp-submit-button-span-text {
				display: inline-block;
				}
								.yikes-mailchimp-container-2 label span {
				font-weight: lighter;
				}
				.yikes-mailchimp-container-2 { color: #333333; padding: 1em; border-style: solid ; border-width: 3px; border-color: #d2d2d2 !important; max-width: 600px; font-family: sans-serif; text-align: center; border: 1px solid transparent; margin: auto;} .yikes-mailchimp-form-title .yikes-mailchimp-form-title-2{ color: #2b6b98 !important; } .yikes-easy-mc-submit-button .yikes-easy-mc-submit-button-2 .btn .btn-primary{ border: 1px solid #eec22b; box-shadow: 0 1px 1px rgba(255, 255, 255, .9) inset; font-weight: bold; margin: 0; min-height: 40px; width: 100%; white-space: normal; background: none; background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.35) 0%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.45) 48%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0) 52%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0) 100%); background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.35)), color-stop(48%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.45)), color-stop(52%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0)), color-stop(100%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0))); background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.35) 0%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.45) 48%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0) 52%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0) 100%); background: -o-linear-gradient(top, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.35) 0%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.45) 48%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0) 52%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0) 100%); background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.35) 0%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.45) 48%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0) 52%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0) 100%); background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.35) 0%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.45) 48%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0) 52%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0) 100%); filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr='#59ffffff', endColorstr='#00ffffff', GradientType=0); }
</style>

<!-- Sidebar Sticky Code -->
<script type="text/javascript">
  $(document).ready(function() {
      var stickydiv = $('#stickyad');
      var stickyPosition = stickydiv.position();

      $(window).scroll(function() {
          var scrollBarPosition = $(window).scrollTop();

          if (scrollBarPosition & gt; = stickyPosition.top) {
              stickydiv.css({
                  'position': 'sticky',
                  'top': 5
              })

          } else {
              stickydiv.css({
                  'position': 'relative',
                  'top': 0
              })
          }

      })
  });
  </script>
